matchfinder 0.0.1
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

all_bipartite_matches()

idea is to complete a search for a given N, or vector N

all_nonbipartite_matches()

Same as all_bipartite_matches but for nbp matching

binary_search()

Generic binary search algo: finding the input.

bipartite_match_sd()

Calculates the standard deviation for a match, on the outcome

bipartite_matches()

Generating bipartite matched pairs

boot_func()

Simple bootstrap function that does a resampling bootstrap of a vector for a given function.

brier_score()

Takes in training/test data and a prediction function to use, generates brier score

brier_score_cv()

For a match, calculates brier score using cross validation

brier_score_split()

For a match, calculates brier score on a test split of the data

compute_sim_result()

Takes in functions to generate simulation data, and computes simulation results for our method and some competitors

covariance_with_ranks()

computes the covariance of the input matrix, adjusting for ranks if given

create_caliper()

Creates caliper penalties

default_error_generator()

Default function to generate mean-zero noise. Very simple.

default_x_generator()

A default function that generates an input data matrix.

example_mean_generator()

An example function that generates a mean vector given an input matrix.

example_treat_prob_generator()

An example function that generates treatment probabilities given an input matrix.

expit()

exp / 1 + exp

fixed_sample()

example from ?sample, when length could be one

fold_indexing()

Produces a list of indices split into k-folds

gen_caliper_list()

Simple wrapper to unify caliper input

gen_propensity_list()

Takes in elements needed for propensity work, checks input and builds a named list.

gen_tolerance_list()

Simple wrapper to unify tolerance input

generate_k_fold_index()

Constructs a k-fold list of index_list objects for a given match_list

generate_p_cut_frame()

Processes the data into the format required for plotting.

generate_plot_list()

Takes the result of generate_p_cut_frame and creates plot lists based on our choise of RMSE function.

generate_random_weights()

Generating random weights to use in matching procedures, each summing to one.

generate_simulation_input()

Generates input needed for a simulation run

generate_train_test_split()

Creates an index_list from a match_list, splitting according to train_fraction

index_list_from_match()

Constructs an index_list from a match_list and a logical index for training data

mahal_imbalance()

Computes the Mahalanobis Imbalance of a match, or set of matches

match_estimate()

Computes a simple mean difference in an outcome vector between treatment and control in a paired match

match_predict_linear()

Function to predict treatment / control pairs using glm (binomial) or lm

match_predict_xgb()

Function to predict treatment / control pairs using xgboost

match_propensity_list()

Generates the propensity parameters used for using propensity-based calipers

n_sink_generator()

Generates a function that generates a vector of sink lengths

near_given_match()

Find nearest index to vector given set of indices

nonbipartite_match_sd_scaled()

Simlar to bipartite_match_sd, except for use with non-bipartite matches.

nonbipartite_matches()

Generating nonbipartite matched pairs

paper_mean_functions()

Generates the four different mean functions we use for simulations in the paper.

paper_treatment_functions()

Generates the four different treatment functions we use for simulations in the paper.

parallel_sim()

Run compute_sim_result in parallel using parallel::mclapply

permutation_bipartite_matches()

Takes matches and their Brier scores, and computes permutation Brier scores and the best matches

permutation_brier()

For a given match, computes the brier score distribution if the pairing were truly random

plot_sims()

Plotting simulation results. Plan: four plots, one for each N value

predict_prepare()

Prepares design matrices and other inputs needed for predictive methods

propensity_bipartite_matches()

Propensity match for (default) bipartite

propensity_nonbipartite_matches()

Propensity match for nbp

propensity_score()

Calculates propensity scores for a given matrix and treatment vector

propensity_score_linear()

Function to predict treatment using glm (binomial) or lm

propensity_score_xgb()

Function to predict treatment using xgboost

reshape_list_of_sims()

Reshapes a list of simulations to a nice dataframe

reshape_p_cut_list()

Reshapes a list of simulations to a nice dataframe, by p-cut

rmse_from_one_func()

Calculates RMSE with a known target of one

sink_brier_bipartite_matches()

Computes all matches, then gets the brier scores for each. Reorder by number of sinks.

swap_pairs()

Given a logical swap vector, switches treated and control units around

target_mean_expit()

Shifts the linear component until the mean of the expit is the target mean.

weighted_mahal()

computes weighted Mahalanobis distance, using Choleski decomp.

x_from_cov()

Generates a matrix where each row is generated with covariance equal to cov_mat.

Contents

Developed by Colman Humphrey.

Site built with pkgdown 1.5.1.
